alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys - The Inland Empire (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued December 08 at 4:37AM PST until December 10 at 12:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING FOR STRONG GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR PORTIONS OF THE INLAND EMPIRE... * WINDS...Northeast 15 to 25 mph with gusts 35 to 50 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...10 to 15 percent Saturday and 8 to 12 percent Sunday. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended. * LOCATION...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys -The Inland Empire.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys - The Inland Empire
